common.subtitle: Code Minifier
common.description: Minify your code from left to right, unminify from right to left — free, fast, and private.

tooltips.autoDetect: Automatically detect the programming language when you paste or type code

about.title: About FastMinify
about.subtitle: The fastest, most reliable online minifier for JavaScript and CSS
about.whatIsText: FastMinify is a free, privacy-focused online tool designed to minify JavaScript and CSS code instantly. Built with modern web technologies, it provides fast, reliable minification without compromising your data privacy.

features.clientSide: 100% Client-side: Your code never leaves your browser
features.lightningFast: Lightning Fast: Minification happens instantly in your browser
features.privacyFirst: Privacy First: No data collection, no tracking, no uploads
features.modernUI: Modern UI: Clean, responsive design with dark mode support
features.advancedOptions: Advanced Options: Safe/Aggressive modes and ES5/ES6+ compatibility
features.freeForever: Free Forever: No registration required, no hidden costs

about.howItWorksText: FastMinify uses industry-standard minification libraries (Terser for JavaScript, CSSO for CSS) running directly in your browser. This means:

howItWorksList.worksOffline: Works offline after initial page load

about.builtWithText: FastMinify is built using modern web technologies to ensure the best performance and user experience:

technologies.nextjs: Next.js 15: React framework for optimal performance

about.openSourceText: FastMinify is open source and available on GitHub. We welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests from the community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Found a bug? Have a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getInTouchText: We're always looking to improve FastMinify. Whether you've found a bug, have a feature request, or just want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.minificationNotWorkingText: Make sure your code is valid JavaScript or CSS. Check the browser console for errors.
contact.codeNotCopyingText: Try using the copy button or manually select and copy the text.
contact.themeNotSavingText: Check if your browser allows localStorage. Try refreshing the page.

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.subject: Brief description
placeholders.message: Please describe your issue or suggestion in detail...

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields.
validation.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Free online tool to minify code instantly — fast, modern, and privacy-friendly.

whyMinify.title: What is code minification?
whyMinify.subtitle: Code minification is the process of removing unnecessary characters from source code without changing its functionality. This includes whitespace, comments, and shortening variable names.

performance.title: File size reduction
performance.description: Minification can reduce JavaScript and CSS file sizes by 30-70%, significantly improving page load times.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth optimization
bandwidth.description: Smaller files mean less data transfer, reducing bandwidth costs and improving user experience on slower connections.

security.title: Code obfuscation
security.description: Minified code is harder to read and reverse-engineer, providing a basic level of code protection.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Our minification tool is designed to be simple, fast and secure.

paste.title: Paste your code
paste.description: Copy and paste your code into the left editor. Our automatic detection recognizes the language.

configure.title: Configure options
configure.description: Customize minification according to your needs: compatibility, compression, optimizations.

getResult.title: Get the result
getResult.description: Your minified code appears instantly. Download or copy the result.

seoOptimization.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
seoOptimization.subtitle: Code minification directly improves your search engine ranking and your site's user experience.

codeExamples.title: Minification examples
codeExamples.subtitle: Discover how minification transforms your code to optimize performance.
